next_steps.note: "Brainstorm 5-10 potential themes or subjects for the poetry collection.",
"Write a first draft of at least one poem, focusing on a chosen theme (aim for 10-20 lines).",
"Research contemporary poets and collections for inspiration and to identify potential stylistic influences.",
"Define the desired tone and style for the poetry (e.g., lyrical, narrative, free verse, formal).",
"Create a basic project outline, including a tentative number of poems and potential sections or groupings."
